original_text: And they burnt the house of God, and brake down the wall of Jerusalem, and burnt all the palaces thereof with fire, and destroyed all the goodly vessels thereof.
korean_text: 또 하나님의 전을 불사르며 예루살렘 성벽을 헐며 그들의 모든 궁실을 불사르며 그들의 모든 귀한 그릇들을 부수고

sentences.original_text: And they burnt the house of God
and brake down the wall of Jerusalem
and burnt all the palaces thereof with fire
and destroyed all the goodly vessels thereof
